title: Mia Goes Fourth
description: Princess Mia Thermopolis's Royal Resolutions: I will stop biting my fingernails.I will kinder to everyone, even cheerleaders.I will spend every waking moment thinking about Michael Moscovitz!Mia's back from her first royal trip to Genovia. Now she's ready for what's really important: her love life.Mia and Michael are finally an item, but Grandmere seems to have other plans. Just before the happy couple's first hot date, an unmissable royal engagement turns up. Could it be that Michael; doesn't measure up - and that (please not!) Grandmere's got someone else in the mind for Princess Amelia Mignoette Grimaldi Thermopolis Renaldo?
author: Meg Cabot
